#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
 
int gcd(int a,int b){
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    else
        return gcd(b,a%b);
}
 
int main(){
    int t; scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int x1,y1,x2,y2; scanf("%d%d%d%d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
        int a = abs(x1-x2),b = abs(y1-y2);
        if(a==0 || b==0){
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        int g = gcd(a,b);
        a = a/g; b = b/g;
        int cells = (a+b-1)*g;
        printf("%d\n",cells);
    }
    return 0;
}
